Articles.Content: Hi I have been playing KSP for a year now but I am still a newbie. I have some craft file to share.

Well everyone is a "newbie" at KSP, unless of course you have studied like astrophysics And I am sure many people would love to see your craft just please put them in the SpaceCraft Exchange. Welcome to the forums!!!

Laugh a little it makes the 'splosions more awesome!

Here is some craft that I post....it lacks feedback at the moment

Aircraft: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84881-CF-1-%E2%80%9CSylph%E2%80%9D-the-multi-role-Fighter

Car: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84976-Spinner-flying-car-from-Blade-Runner?p=1248480#post1248480
